fixes.name: Top N Filter
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR TopN = SELECTEDVALUE('Top N'[Display As])
VAR RankValue = RANKX(
    ALL('test+'),
    CALCULATE(SUM('test+'[Likes_Received_Per_Day])),
    BLANK(),
    0
)
RETURN
RankValue <= TopN
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated Tableau RANK(SUM([Likes_Received_Per_Day])) <= [Parameters].[Top N] into DAX. Replaced the parameter with SELECTEDVALUE('Top N'[Display As]) per parameter rules. Replaced Tableau RANK over an aggregate with RANKX over ALL('test+') and CALCULATE(SUM('test+'[Likes_Received_Per_Day])) to compute the rank; used BLANK() for the optional value and 0 for descending order. The measure returns TRUE/FALSE when the rank is less than or equal to the selected Top N.
